requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
